title: Geist Day for a Zeit Wedding 6/23: 7.4 Magnitude, Fauci, Ron Jeremy, Mel Gibson and Winona Ryder
itunes:title: Geist Day for a Zeit Wedding 6/23: 7.4 Magnitude, Fauci, Ron Jeremy, Mel Gibson and Winona Ryder
description:
On this edition of Geist Day for a Zeit Wedding Jack and Miles discuss the 7.4 earthquake that just hit Mexico, Dr. Fauci is "cautiously optimistic" about getting a vaccine before years end, Ron Jeremy has been charged with 4 cases of Sexual Assault, and Winona tells behind the scenes stories of Hollywood and Mel Gibson telling racist and sexist jokes constantly.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
